options.label: كد 501 تا 700 ||  كار گروه‌ها و كميته‌ها

items.name: Ext_Org_Type
items.label: انواع سازمانهاي خارجي ثبت شده
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ORG_Master_Code, 'موضوع سازمان را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_Master_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_Master_Code, concat(ORG_Master_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = 'X'
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_Type_Select
items.label: انتخاب سازمان
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ORG_Master_Code, 'سازمان را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_Master_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_Master_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Type = '@#ORG_Type'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L1_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب واحد سازماني سطح يك
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L1_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L1_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L1_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L2_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب واحد سازماني سطح 2
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L2_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L2_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L2_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L3_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب واحد سازماني سطح سه
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L3_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L3_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L3_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L4_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب واحد سازماني سطح چهار
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L4_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L4_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L4_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L5_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب واحد سازماني سطح پنج
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L5_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L5_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L5_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code = '@#ORG_L4_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L5_Code <> 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_Code
items.label: كد اصلي
items.sql:
SELECT Org_Code
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: ORG_Name
items.label: عنوان اصلي سازمان/واحد
items.sql:
SELECT Org_Name
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: EX_ID_Detector
items.label: رديف خارجي
items.sql:
SELECT ID
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#Ext_Org_Type'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'X'
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: IN_ID_Detector
items.label: رديف داخلي
items.sql:
SELECT ID
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code = '@#ORG_L4_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L5_Code = '@#ORG_L5_Code_Select'
 and IsActive = 1

var_accepted_values.label: كد 501 تا 700 ||  كار گروه‌ها و كميته‌ها
